greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{d|n} Kronecker(-1, d).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) is multiplicative with a(2^e) = e + 1, a(p^e) = e + 1 if p == 1 (mod 4), a(p^e) = (1 + (-1)^e) / 2 if p == 3 (mod 4). - _Michael Somos_, Jan 05 2012
Dirichlet g.f.: zeta(s)*beta(s)/(1 - 2^(-s)), where beta is the Dirichlet beta function. - _Ralf Stephan_, Mar 27 2015
mathematica: a[n_] := DivisorSum[n, KroneckerSymbol[-1, #] &]; Array[a, 105] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 02 2015 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<1, 0, direuler( p=2, n, 1/((1 - X) * (1 - kronecker( -1, p) * X))) [n])} /* _Michael Somos_, Jan 05 2012 */
(PARI) {a(n) = if( n<1, 0, sumdiv( n, d, kronecker( -1, d)))} /* _Michael Somos_, Jan 05 2012 */
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
